title: Barcelona vs Villarreal live stream: How to watch La Liga match online and on TV
text:
Barcelona are enduring their worst start to a La Liga campaign in 25 years and now face Villarreal.

The Blaugrana were humbled at Granada last weekend, falling 2-0 in their second defeat of the season, extending their run without an away win to seven matches.

Ernesto Valverde will be desperate to pick up a win here and kick-start their season.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Particularly with their rivals also faltering and Real Madrid, joint-top with Athletic Bilbao, only four points ahead.

Here’s how you can watch the Catalan giants back at the Camp Nou.

What channel is it on?

The game is on Premier Sports 2 with coverage starting at 7:55pm (BST) and the game kicking off at 8pm.

Is there a live stream online?

Yes, Premier Sports run the Premier Player which offers an online streaming service for all their content, including La Liga matches. You can sign up here.

Odds

Barcelona 2/7

Draw 11/2

Villarreal 15/2

Team news

Jordi Alba is out with a thigh injury, so too is Samuel Umtiti with a metatarsal injury.

Probable line-ups

Barcelona: Ter Stegen; Semedo, Piqué, Lenglet, Junior Firpo; Arthur, Busquets, Arturo Vidal; Ansu Fati, Suárez, Messi

Villarreal: Asenjo; Rubén Peña, Albiol, Pau Torres, Quintillà; Iborra, Cazorla, Anguissa; Ekambi, Chukwueze, Ekambi, Gerard Moreno
